block.p: Nobody has figured out yet why Firestone tires have been failing on Ford Explorers, but the government has raised to 62 its tally of deaths attributed to the tires in consumer complaints filed with regulators. Most occurred when the tires failed at high speed and the Explorers rolled over. State Farm, the nation's largest auto insurer, said that it began billing Firestone for tire incidents in 1997, and mentioned the problem to regulators in 1998.
